Dr. K. Y,

Tients, North Cheon.

raw: Dr. K. Y, Tients, North Cheon. Your Batter of the 4th 7 November ou mining check for live hundred dollars we duly received by me yesterday. I have deposited the money in question to the acaount of your son, and will see that it is sxpanded in accordance with your request, in furthering your boys aducation and in meeting the entendaal en panges of the sone. In order that you may nen sunt to sxpanded thua ise, I analoee an itemized acount to dis, Giriously. Se sing the boy's Punde lune been himself had been in my office only a fer minutes before your letton and aheal aerised, decussing me finanassi zitution, for he had been obliged to drengura his ancount slightly, and naturelly felt somewhat concerned about it. Insure you that is real pleasure to me to be able to render pats alight distanse to our Chinese boya, 30 tar sxy crom home, and otheb parents, For several years I have looked after the funds of a number of our boys in 18 way, and have desmad it a privilege to de . metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the draft for $500 credited to his son's account and enclosing a statement of account. He states he has just met with Sung Sing who was concerned because he had overdrawn his account.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
